name: Gourmet Bandit
description: Donning its signature rogue mask, this "Chip Bandit" Gull-inspired figurine perfectly captures the essence of a full-fledged Gourmet Bandit.\n"The Blubberbeasts say Natlan's cuisine is out of this world. Heh... Then of course I, the Gourmet Bandit, have to taste it for myself!"
